description: The government publishes two plans to either build a new facility or refurbish the existing site.
title: Proposed update to 'unfit' Guernsey Dairy site
title_page: Proposed update to 'unfit' Guernsey Dairy site - BBC News
maintext: STSB said their preferred option would be the construction of a new purpose-built facility, because of the difficulty of "maintaining current operations while carrying out a major refurbishment" of the existing St Andrew site.
